languages.text: "Просто один спятивший аристократ огреб, пытаясь образумить другого спятившего аристократа. Как только богатеи не развлекаются..."
"Just one crazy aristocrat getting into trouble trying to talk sense into another crazy aristocrat. Rich people have a strange way of amusing themselves..."
languages.original_text: "Просто один спятивший аристократ огреб, пытаясь образумить другого спятившего аристократа. Как только богатеи не развлекаются..."

traits.locale_text: "Just one crazy aristocrat getting into trouble trying to talk sense into another crazy aristocrat. Rich people have a strange way of amusing themselves..."
"Just one crazy aristocrat getting into trouble trying to talk sense into another crazy aristocrat. Rich people have a strange way of amusing themselves..."
"Just one crazy aristocrat getting into trouble trying to talk sense into another crazy aristocrat. Rich people have a strange way of amusing themselves..."
"Just one crazy aristocrat getting into trouble trying to talk sense into another crazy aristocrat. Rich people have a strange way of amusing themselves..."
"Just one crazy aristocrat getting into trouble trying to talk sense into another crazy aristocrat. Rich people have a strange way of amusing themselves..."

languages.text: "Nur ein verrückter Aristokrat, der Ärger bekommen hat, weil er versucht hat, einen anderen verrückten Aristokraten zur Vernunft zu bringen. Die Reichen haben eine sondere Art, sich zu amüsieren ..."
languages.original_text: "Just one crazy aristocrat getting into trouble trying to talk sense into another crazy aristocrat. Rich people have a strange way of amusing themselves..."

traits.locale_text: "Nur ein verrückter Aristokrat, der Ärger bekommen hat, weil er versucht hat, einen anderen verrückten Aristokraten zur Vernunft zu bringen. Die Reichen haben eine sondere Art, sich zu amüsieren ..."

languages.text: « Un aristocrate fêlé qui tente à ses risques et périls de raisonner l'un de ses pairs. Décidément, les nantis ont de drôles de façons de s'amuser... »
languages.original_text: "Just one crazy aristocrat getting into trouble trying to talk sense into another crazy aristocrat. Rich people have a strange way of amusing themselves..."

traits.locale_text: « Un aristocrate fêlé qui tente à ses risques et périls de raisonner l'un de ses pairs. Décidément, les nantis ont de drôles de façons de s'amuser... »

languages.text: «Un aristócrata loco se mete en problemas intentando hacer que otro aristócrata loco entre en razón. Qué pasatiempos más raros tienen los ricos...».
languages.original_text: "Just one crazy aristocrat getting into trouble trying to talk sense into another crazy aristocrat. Rich people have a strange way of amusing themselves..."

traits.locale_text: «Un aristócrata loco se mete en problemas intentando hacer que otro aristócrata loco entre en razón. Qué pasatiempos más raros tienen los ricos...».

languages.text: 「狂った貴族が、他の狂った貴族を説得しようとしてトラブルに巻き込まれる。金持ちというのは奇妙な楽しみを持っているものね…」
languages.original_text: "Just one crazy aristocrat getting into trouble trying to talk sense into another crazy aristocrat. Rich people have a strange way of amusing themselves..."

traits.locale_text: 「狂った貴族が、他の狂った貴族を説得しようとしてトラブルに巻き込まれる。金持ちというのは奇妙な楽しみを持っているものね…」

languages.text: “不过是一个发了疯的贵族非要给自己惹上麻烦，打算说服另一个发了疯的贵族。有钱人总是能找到奇怪的方式自娱自乐……”
languages.original_text: "Just one crazy aristocrat getting into trouble trying to talk sense into another crazy aristocrat. Rich people have a strange way of amusing themselves..."

traits.locale_text: “不过是一个发了疯的贵族非要给自己惹上麻烦，打算说服另一个发了疯的贵族。有钱人总是能找到奇怪的方式自娱自乐……”

languages.original_text: "Just one crazy aristocrat getting into trouble trying to talk sense into another crazy aristocrat. Rich people have a strange way of amusing themselves..."

languages.text: "Deli bir aristokratın aklını başına getirmeye çalışırken başı belaya giren başka bir deli aristokrat daha. Zengin insanların kendilerini eğlendirme yöntemleri çok tuhaf..."
languages.original_text: "Just one crazy aristocrat getting into trouble trying to talk sense into another crazy aristocrat. Rich people have a strange way of amusing themselves..."
